Name: Priya
Title: Fun filled trip with lots of adventure
Review: I travelled to Meghalaya with wanderon with Team captain Tanushka. It was a really great experience. All the view points mentioned in the itinerary were covered. Punctuality was top notch. Tanushka made sure to give us timely wake up calls and gave us proper briefing about the things that we might need to take care of while exploring all the view points. All the hotels that we stayed at served good food and had all the basic amenities. Trips generally become more fun when you enjoy the company of the people you‚Äôre travelling with. I had some amazing set of people. Most importantly, people in Meghalaya are really not greedy. So shopping is not something you‚Äôll feel cheated upon. Be prepared for the most adventurous treks you would have ever experienced especially to Wei Sawdong and Double decker root bridge. Also, please try Zip lining at Umngot river on the day you‚Äôll reach the camping zone. It was super fun! Had a great time. Thanks wanderon! üòä

Name: Sirat K
Title: 1000% would recommend
Review: It was me and my cousin's first ever trip with WanderOn and I'm so happy to say that it was the best decision we took. We did the Meghalaya backpacking trip with them and it was amazing to say the least. Everything from the accommodations to the food and the activities involved were superb! Best of all, our team captain Tanushka with her buoyant spirit and killer personality, who made sure we were so well taken care off and had the time of our lives! With her around it felt like nothing could go wrong and in her we made a friend for life!Also mad credit to Divyansh (the co-captain) for being the best sport and putting up with our shenanigans and drama!Would üíØ recommend booking your next trip with them, I'm surely looking forward to mine! ‚ù§Ô∏èPs: here's a pic with our 2 captains and now best buds.

Name: Roohi
Title: Fulfilled memorable Trip to Meghalaya
Review: It was my first trip to Meghalaya  with WanderOn and it was very memorable.The trip was well planned, the captain's (Tanushka and Divyansh)communicated well and professionally. They guided and helped us very well.They encouraged and provided strength while trekking. Had an awesome experience with them and totally recommend traveling with them

Name: Reema
Title: Awesome
Review: Its my first trip with WanderOn to Meghalaya and It  was the most memorable one ,all thanks to our captains(Tanushka and Divyansh ) who guided and planned the trips. The entire trip was fun and memorable

Name: Priyanka
Title: Good experience
Review: It was my first trip going with group and wanderon made it easy, comfortable and fun. I went to kasol rudranag trek and I really enjoyed there. Our captain shivanshu was friendly and made sure that each person would enjoy and  complete their trek comfortably with no hustle. I'm satisfied with wanderon service. They had planned for everything very well. Overall it was a good experience travelling with them and meeting with new people.

Name: Samarth Sankhla
Title: Beautiful trip
Review: Kayaking through the cleanest river in asia was definitely a mind blowing experience, food accomodation etc everything was good.

Name: Sushil
Title: Meghalaya with Tanushka
Review: Had a wonderful trip to Meghalaya. (21-26 Jab)Good stay. Good food. Good team management.Thanks to Tanushka for engaging everyone on the trip. Highly enthusiastic and energetic trip leader. She has her own rule book and also fun book as well...üòú.. too meticulous management in terms of say wake up call, food arrangement, time management etc. Overall a budget trip and nicely managed....üòä

Name: Asmeet
Title: Awesome, once in a while
Review: I traveled to Bir Billing with Wander on. It was a 1 night 2 days experience. Tarun Pratap Singh lead us as a trip captain, the trip experience was awesome, the food, the trip captain was available at arms length. Paisa vasool trip

Name: Prerana
Title: Beautiful journey in Majestic Meghalaya
Review: This was my first trip with WanderOn and definitely not the last one. I went to Meghalaya with them and at start I was only aware about the Iternary itself but once the trip started I knew I made the right choice. Everything from Hotel/Resort stays, travel, food and Captain was perfect. All the spots mentioned was covered with ease and captain made sure that we enjoy every moment there without any rush. Talking about our captain Ashutosh Bindra. From start he was very friendly and helpful. He made me understand not only about their culture but also how important Nature is to us. By being friendly with us he also took his job very seriously and before start of each day gave us a detailed briefing. His Time management  and decision making skills were excellent. He was well aware about their culture and local language. He made sure that there's no single dull moment with at most safety. Captain Bindra - "Khublei Shibun" to make my journey this beautiful!

Name: Nitesh Mishra
Title: A very Unique and Amazing experience!
Review: I joined wanderOn's weekend Tirthan batch. The trip turned out to be really amazing. They provided the group with the best accomodation, food, activities and view. The captains were really cool and made sure that everyone in the group stays involved throughout the trip through various activities. I would like to thank WanderOn for such an amazing experience, probably the best trip till now.

Name: Pradeep Pathak
Title: One of the best trekking experience!
Review: I have been on multipe trips with WanderOn before and all of them were great memorable experiences. This time I went to Kedarkantha Trek and again they made sure I had a fantastic time, the trek to the summit was so enthralling and unforgettable, It was one of the best trekking experiences me. Also, a huge shout to Tarun, the team captain, He made sure the group had good fun throughout the entire trip and also ensured the safety of the group through the trek. It's experiences like this that I tend to choose them again and again. Thanks so much!

Name: Chhabil T
Title: Kasol rudranaag trip
Review: Meet new people , amazing itinerary and visited beautiful places. Good arrangements especially the tour guide was very fun and supportive

Name: Mohini Shukla
Title: Beautiful and worth it
Review: went to weekend Tirthan Valley trip and I Loved every second of it. kashish & Shaaz are amazing team captions. Wander on did a great job with acco, food, activities- major trip withdrawal is happening now. Can‚Äôt wait to travel again with Wander On

Name: Rekha kukreja
Title: Trip caption was the beat
Review: This was my second trip with wander on and i shall say it honestly that wander never disappoint for their trips. It was complete girls trip and our caption was shefali who actually made this trip more fun and interesting.One thing i dint like in this trip was no single tempo traveller was assigned to us coz of which we had to carry our bags multiple times.

Name: Mayank jain
Title: The hidden gem
Review: Went to a trip to Kasol with wanderon, it was an amazing experience. Everything was upto the mark and our trip captain Shivanshu was super fun. Wish to travel again in the future

Name: Vtravels
Title: Great one to Tirthan Valley
Review: Like in my precious trips, had a great time with Wanderon in Tirthan Valley trip. Both captains Kashish and Shaz were amazing throughout the trip and made the trip even more enjoyable.Cheers,Vipin

Name: Snigdha
Title: Manali Weekend Trip
Review: Recently did a weekend Manali Trip with WanderOn.It was one of most perfect and enjoyable vacations i have done with a travel group.The trip captains Rahul and Ahaan definitely deserve a special shout out. They absolutely do their best to understand the needs of all people in the group.The company gives specific importance to individual experiences which is rare.Everything from the hotel to the food organised was top notch!I did a solo trip and no only felt safe every second of the trip, but made relations that would last a long time. Definitely would recommend them over any other company!

Name: Ashish Sharma
Title: Amazing!
Review: This community is all about like minded people for whom travel is much more than just an experience. I went to Kasol-Rudranaag Trek with WanderOn and had a gala time with fellow travelers and group captain. This trip gave me lifetime memories & new bondings. Kudos to Shivanshu for being such an amazing Trip captain.

Name: Rishabh
Title: Greattt
Review: This was my third trip with wanderon and as always was not disappointed at all , met some really amazing people and had a great time with our captains, looking forward to travel again

Name: Anuj kumar
Title: Chandrashilla trek ,Jan 2023
Review: I wholeheartedly endorse the Chandrashilla and Tungnath Trek to anyone seeking excitement and enjoyment. Everything about the experience was amazing, and we were treated with great hospitality, thank to our captain Akash Rangar. The trip captain ensured that everyone in the group always felt safe and secure.

Name: deepak j
Title: Chopta tungnath chandershilla summit
Review: Experience with wander on is always goodIt's my second solo  trip with them.... Chopta tungnath i have done  27th to 31st batchCaption of the trip Mr. Aakash rangar "sky" he is  coolest and active guy in our batch.. one thing i missed in this trip that there were  no girl in this group ü•≤

Name: Rahul Nayak
Title: Chopta Trip
Review: Travelling with WanderOn was really an amazing experience. Especially our captain, Akash Rangar. Our trip to Chopta was as sooth as it could be

Name: Bhavesh
Title: Amazing
Review: Today was my 2nd trip with WanderOn. Both were absolutely amazing. The trip leaders were very friendly and nicely done planning. Trip leader- Akash Rangar - Very good nature

Name: Simran
Title: Excellent!
Review: Excellent! This was my first trip to north India and it was just an amazing experience. The service was amazing.

Name: Parvinder
Title: CHOPTA TUNGNATH REVIEW
Review: I travelled with wanderon from 27 to 31 Jan on the trip of chopta tungnath. This was my third time with wanderon and the quality expected was same top notch. The stay was awesome as usual and the meal was also super. Talking about our coordinator Akash Rangar aka (Sky bhai). What a gem kind of a person he is. He took his responsibility very seriously not even a single thing that I can tell bad about him from managing the crowd to client interaction everything he was doing in a very professional way. Plus very impressive fact about him was that while going to devprayag I got injured my foot got swelled up because of which I was not able to walk dunno how he managed both first of all he gave me first aid and after that he  took other clients to sangam and later came back to me and took me to doctor there who gave me proper treatment. Literally I'm feeling short of words to thank this guy. Would surely recommend wanderon to everyone and if it's with akash bhai then it's cherry on cake. Thanks wanderon thanks akash for all these memories. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Veronica Eugene Tobias
Title: Wonderful experience
Review: I was traveling solo for the first time & WanderOn made it so easy for me. From the start to the end it was such a great experience. One of the best trips.

Name: Abhinav
Title: Great trip happens with great people
Review: Stay is okay. Captain was cool. Fellow travellers were great. Place was heavenly.Amazing experience and memories.

Name: Roseline Navya
Title: WanderOn Group Travel Expirience
Review: Having done 2 trips with WanderOn so far (Summer Spiti and Manali/Solang) and must say they offer the best group trip/community travel experiences!The process from end to end (from booking to travel and back) was well taken care off and the team ensured we all have a great time and take back some fondest memories...They provide amazing captains who are professionals, well equipped, cheerful and accomodating that ensures the group is having fun - all while not compromising on safety either (shout out to Tanushka, Prashant, Sachin - Spiti in Aug'22 and Rahul, Aahan - Manali/Solang in Jan'23 for the great trips)...Group travel experiences are so enriching and a must have and would highly recommend anyone wanting to do one, to plan the same with WanderOn team!An experience you will cherish indeed üòä

Name: Karishma Manuel
Title: Value, Quality, Fun
Review: I attended the Manali Solang trip with WanderOn. The accomodation and food provided was really nice. Special thanks to our captains, Rahul Rajput and Aahan Aditya for making this a memorable experience. They were really helpful and super fun. Overall an amazing trip.

Name: Sampreetha
Title: The Best‚ù§Ô∏è

Thank you WanderOn and our expectations were exceeded is what we would like to say!Definitely recommending my friends for their trips with WanderOn!All the very best team, Keep growing‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Harshita Jain
Title: WanderOn Manali Solang Trip

Name: Vivek Kumar
Title: Wonderful experience

He was very considerate to our request and took extra care to make us feel comfortable at every step.Will definitely travel with WanderOn again. üòä

Name: Vinayak L

Name: Diksha
Title: Tirthan valley adventure
Review: Great experience and the trip was amazing.I really enjoyed it and appreciated that shaaz and kashish made it fun. Thankyou for a wonderful trip.Lots of loveDiksha

Name: Komal
Title: Awesome trip with wanderonüòä

Name: Vaishali Gupta
Title: Awesome
Review: I had a wonderful experience with WanderOn. Both the captains (Rahul and Aahan) done all the things in best possible manner. I enjoyed alot on this trip. Will surely plan another trip with  WanderOn.

Name: Mayank Aggarwal
Title: Manali Solang trip

Name: Annika
Title: First trip with WanderOn

Name: Mudit Khandelwal
Title: A trip to remember‚ù§Ô∏è
Review: Really amazing trip‚ù§Ô∏èwell conducted and organised by Wander on. Special thanks to our captains Kashish and shaaz, who made us feel comfortable and safe during the trip and helped us make beautiful memories.

Name: Prateek Sachdeva
Title: An Adventure - Jibhi and Tirthan Valley
Review: Spectacular trip with WonderOn. The captains assigned took care of all the necessities for the travells and made sure we were comfortable. The activities took place on time and the food, stay, travels were comfortable as well. The stay was near the river. Will soon plan another trip with WonderOn.

Name: Shubham
Title: First Group Travel
Review: Our first group trip and shaaz and kashish made it a memorable one. Wonderful stay, happy faces and quality time. Will definitely plan another with wanderon soon.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èWith Love,Shubham & Diksha

Name: AC2
Title: Tirthan Valley- Perfect mix of adventure and relaxation
Review: The itinerary was well planned and covered some of the major attractions across the valley.The treks were not too difficult and were perfect for someone who is just starting out on their trekking journey.The group was nice and friendly and our wanderon captains Shaaz and Kashish were wonderful and managed the entire trip meticulously.10/10 , will recommend this to anyone who wants a short city break that is the perfect blend of adventure and peace.

Name: Deepika
Title: OUR FIRST COMMUNITY TRAVEL
Review: It was wonderful with Shaaz and Kashish!! They made our first trip, a best and memorable one!! Will plan a next one with Wanderon soon!! Thank you Wanderon and team captains for such a comfortable and happening trip!! ‚ô•Ô∏èWith lots of love!! DEEPIKA!!

Name: Avni
Title: Wander On - Go to Trip Partner
Review: Had an amazing experience with the Group and the trip felt very safe and wholesome with memories to look back to. Thanks to Team Captains, amazing execution and efforts of all the activities.

Name: Deepakshi Sharma
Title: Adventure trip
Review: The trip was amazing. Shaaz and Kashish- our captains hosted us well. We visited all the places mentioned in the itinerary and our captains made sure that all the activities took place timely. The stay was by the river and the group was a true delight to have fun with. Food, stay, travel and everything was organised really well. Thanks WonderOn.

Name: Jay
Title: Kedarkantha 2023
Review: Was good experience with wanderon captain while doing kedarkantha. Nice food and decent stay.overall a very good experience

Name: KTS PRASAD
Title: Next level Trip
Review: What a trip ‚ù§Ô∏èIt was my first Solo Trip and I didn't feel it,like from day one it was one family fromdifferent cities, 6 girls and 3 boys showing thetrust and safety provided by the company.I just booked 3 to 4 days ago after all myfriends backed out.WanderOn provides outstanding services, be it accommodation, be it transportation our Gopal Bhai (Driver) was the best.. very skilled Pilot who took us around all the destination on time, of course also credit goes to our captain Ashutosh Bindra for his excellent time management.I am in love with Nature in Meghalaya, now thanks to everyone who made it memorable.Special thanks to Gopal Bhai (our pilot),Steady, Deenu and Daniel (our guide and camping staff) and our group was very sorted, me and twoother girls were the youngest, I felt likeHome from day one. I am happy I didn't miss the due to my friends backing outas usual. Saved the best for the lastOUR TEAM CAPTAIN - Mr. Ashutosh Bindra, He is All in one package, Frankly speaking I just got a brother, and lucky to have his company as my brother, thanks to him the whole trip was Safe, Timely done, Fun, and whatnot and apart from Managing us two morethings I wanna highlight 1. What a dancer heis, Next level bhaiiiii. 2. Excellent Photography skills, That's the reason I told he is the whole package.My first Solo Trip was Next level with this company and I look forward to having more in the near future and if possible please get my brother as the team captain for my next destination too I will be too happy and grateful and now I don't wanna go back to Mumbai but kya kare Jana padega but packed my bag full of memories for a lifetime.

Name: Vishal
Title: Kedarkanta Trekking
Review: Kedarkanta trekking with WonderOn.Very good experience with wonderOn, My Captain Tarun bhai was very helpful person. In the trek food quality was very good and tasty

Name: Aishwarya
Title: Fantastic
Review: I had been for Meghalaya backpacking trip dated 17th January 2023 with my friend.Since this was my first community travel, I wanted to be sure of what I was getting into. After sufficient research, we zeroed down on wanderon. Initially we were skeptical about wanderon and it‚Äôs services and the kind of people who would be joining us.Day 0 - Ashutosh Bindra, our trip captain called to inform me about the trip and gave me certain guidelines. He was talking quite casually which sort of broke the ice. I feel that is more important coz only then will we trust the man who is leading this bunch of people. Only two minutes of my conversation with him eased me out. This showed how diligent and comforting Wanderon is.The trip started and went on so smoothly, without any hiccups. Generally with a group of 4 people also, there can be nuisances but here this guy led a whole group of 9 people and yet there was no trouble. The accommodations and services provided by wanderon were perfect and very thoughtfully chalked out itinerary. The food was arranged after taking utmost care of each and everyone‚Äôs preferences.Our captain was quite helpful, rather was going out of his way for us to create the most beautiful memories. He follows his words ‚Äúhe wants others to experience the nature to the fullest‚Äù in letter and spirit.Honest, warm and welcoming trip captain cum friend he is. His emotional connect with everyone is the primary reason why he does an excellent job.I am sure I will go for another trip with Wanderon and hope to get Ashutosh as our team captain.

Name: Apoorva Singh
Title: Serendipity
Review: Meghalaya backpacking trip was my first trip and WanderOn undoubtedly was the first choice as recommended by sister of my bestie.Having heard of good reviews of WanderOn, we knew we had signed for something good, but it exceeded expectations.This trip was everything that we imagined and more.Our group comprised of people from different parts of country and it was fun to share this journey with them. Everyone wonderful and unique. We went back with bag full of memories. It was fun to walk through the green, step on rocks, fall while climbing stairs and rise again. It has been a very serene, deep, mind numbing experience. Everything was quiet, peaceful and again serene. I would like to thank our Captain Ashutosh for making our trip smooth, fun and relaxing at the same time. He was kind, considerate and engaged everyone in the group while ensuring everyone's comfort and safety.This trip has been life changing for me, testing my limits and sparking the imagination as for what more we can do and explore.Simply Splendid ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Harshita
Title: Wonderfully done
Review: This was my first trip with wanderon,my sister recommended it to me.My friend and I wanted to go on a trip for a really long time and we finally settled on travelling to Meghalaya with wanderon ,and it was the best decision.We had a wonderful experience,we met the best group of people and had a safe and amazing experience,our Captain Ashutosh made our trip as fun and smooth as he could,and he did a great job .Would definitely recommend Wanderon to everyone ü´∂

Name: Pankaj Wadhwani
Title: It was good and memorable trip
Review: It was my first trip with WanderOn and I had a good experience with my trip. I had traveled Bir-Billing, Kasol & Rudranaag. It was very good and memorable trip of mine and I had never experienced such a trip before. Our trip caption Maaz was very cool and of good nature he had guide our trip very well and made all our demands fulfill other than itinerary also.The trip itinerary was also well planned and whole trip was done according to itinerary.

Name: Pratik Sanjay Wagh
Title: Relaxing and a memorable experience
Review: Everything from food to stay to all the activities and places mentioned in the whole iternary. Most importantly the people and the trip leader

Name: Chirag c
Title: Excellent
Review: Overall trip experience was excellentAnd our team captain maaz was very cooperative and polite..I recommend wanderon if u r a solo traveler or group traveler..The hotels and camps were amazing and all the meals and facilities were great Overall trip experience was excellentAnd our team captain maaz was very cooperative and polite..I recommend wanderon if u r a solo traveler or group traveler..The hotels and camps were amazing and all the meals and facilities were great

Name: Jahir
Title: Excellent tour Operator and Captains
Review: We travelled Manli Solang Valley with WanderOn on Jan 06/01/23. We enjoyed a lot on that trip.Our trip captain Himanshu and Shresth did their job very well. Thank you WanderOn for giving us such kind of amazing tour experience. You can trust them blindly for your upcoming trip.

Name: Passnik30
Title: Excellent
Review: Just did the Himachal Trip with WanderOn and probably is one of my best decisions of 2023 !! An awesome team of trip leaders who are super chilled out & fun to hang out with.We did have some feedback for the trip leaders at the beginning which was heard and we saw changes in the subsequent days, which was awesome. WanderOn team is open to feedback and did their best to make us comfortable. The stays/ hotels booked were safe, clean and awesome..no complaints there. Overall a fun trip with a fun gang ! Will probably do another one with WanderOn soon. Thanks for the memories WanderOn !!üòçüòç

Name: Tanbir laskar
Title: Amazing
Review: Very good vacation. Nice tour package. Customer friendly. overall very good experience with wanderon.

Name: Satyalika
Title: They are just the best!
Review: Loved every bit of the trip! Everything was better than expected, I am just so so glad I‚Äôve taken this trip and so glad I‚Äôve come across this awesome travel group! All the facilities were great, the planning was so good and the best best part was our team captain Aahaan Aditya, he is more than a gem, all of us just lovedddd him! Such a Multitalented person with the cutest personality! He has had crazy experiences in mountaineering earlier and we loved listening to his awesome stories with his dramatic storytelling! He made sure the team had a great time and more than anything he has taken such good care of everyone in the group! For him this is not a job but sheer passion! I don‚Äôt know how we got so lucky to have gotten him as our team captain!! Then only bad part is we have been spoilt for good that we can‚Äôt accept anyone but him!! üòùBut thank you so so much Wander on and the entire team, you guys are doing a fantastic job! I‚Äôm someone very hard to please and I‚Äôve loved it!

Name: TAPAS
Title: woooooh
Review: I have never come across such a pleasant and friendly trip package in my entire life. Thanx to the wander on for these types of perfect arrangement.Accommodations r out of my imagination.I must thanx to our cool captains Rahul & Izaan. They r so caring,humble & very much professional.The information they provided us  has been instrumental in understanding the true essence of the wonderful locations we visited.

Name: Akky Sakhare
Title: Best experience with wandorOn... amazing coordinaing with captain.. wonderful experience üòç
Review: I had a great time with wandorOn team for 5 days,  our group are awesomeüòçüï∫üèª. Thanks to Rahul bhai and Izaan bhaiü•Ç. These two friendly guides gave us an ultimate experience through our whole trekking journey. I loved the time i spent with our both guides in these 5 days , and both of them were fabulous in leading the whole groupüë¨. Highly recommended waondorOn if u plan your trekking trip.üòç

Name: Chirag
Title: A trip to be remembered
Review: It was one of my BEST trips so far and it's all thanks to Ahaan Aditya, the way he managed the whole trip was just too good. We went to McLeodganj Bir Tirthan and all the things in the itinerary were covered and we could do a few extra things too!! From the start till the end, everything on the trip was so comfortable. I was worried about the people coming on the trip but Ahaan made us all feel so comfortable. Would love to travel more with WanderOn‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: meensara
Title: Mcleodganj - Bir - Tirthan Valley
Review: Started this year with a trip to Mcleodganj-Bir-Tirthan with WanderOn and it was one of the best trips I've ever been on! Everything from the management, food, accomodation was amazing, all thanks to our trip captain Ahaan Aditya. The way he managed the entire trip while also keeping us entertained and motivated was awesome. Each day was a brand new experience and the way the itinerary was planned was really good. We were occupied the whole time and each activity was well timed and we also got ample time to relax and just have fun as a group. Looking forward to a lot more trips with WanderOn, especially with Ahaan! üòÇüèîÔ∏è

Name: Jaya
Title: Mind-blowing  experience
Review: We had a wonderful  trip to Himachal  pradesh. Oh man such an amazing  trip that one can never forget in his life time. Mcleodgunj,Birbilling,Thirthan Valley,Jalori pass,Kullu,Choi waterfalls.. oh such a lovely experience. All should  experience this beauty atleast once in lifetime. Our trip captain  Aahan  Aditya was such an Awesome  person with good management  skills and took so much care for each one of us. He made the trip such a lovely wonderful  memorable one. In each and every aspect, right from food to bedding all were super and we all enjoyed the trip as a team. He brought all the team members  together now really we are missing  each other. We were counting the days.. oh and felt sad seeing soon our trip was going to end. Thanks a lot to Wonderon and my team captain  Aahan for giving such an enjoyable experience. With loveJaya

Name: Krushna Shirsath
Title: Awesome Experience
Review: It was my first trip to Manali kasol Rudranag with WanderOn and it was a good experience. The Captains were experienced and had well planned everything in advance. They themselves made sure that we enjoy to the fullest. Accomodation and food was good looking at the trip budget. All the best guys... wishing you all the success.

Name: Namita
Title: JUST AMAZING
Review: Hello guys, this was my first trip with WanderOn and also with trekking, camping.I must say with a broad smile ‚ÄúWhat a trip, what an experience and what a group of friends (strangers). I went to Kasol-Rudranag-Manali with WanderOn (7th Jan to 13th Jan 2023), and I am super happy that I started my year with these wonderful experience and people.Before going in detail, I must say I found another two-captain cool ‚ÄúIZAAN & RAHUL‚Äù during this trip. Their presence was like cherry on the cake. It never felt like they are at their work and not my friends. It‚Äôs just amazing how skillfully they manage their work giving the travelers the best experience, adding a personal touch and also highly professional.The food quality, the hotels that we stayed in, etc was worth every penny spent, probably more than what I have spent. We visited Manikaran gurudwara, kasol market, rudranag, solang valley and Manali. The stay in Manali (Hotel Rock Manali by Vivan) was a pleasant surprise for all my group. Experiencing the live snow fall in Solang is a lifetime memory to be cherished. Every day was too much fun and the captains were highly experienced and had well planned everything in advance. It was surprising for me when we all were hell tired after entire day activities, the captains start their planning for next day making sure it should be perfect. A big salute to their passion and dedication.Coming to the trekking and camping, the captains were so helping and motivating throughout the trekking and trust me they will make sure you finish it happily. But shocked to see their planning and arrangement in the thick of the forest. It was just beyond imagination the perfect camping location, camps, the food and the warmth from the bonfire they had arranged there. It never felt risky or scary anytime. The whole team (captains, WanderOn office SPOCs, local guide) is super supportive and takes your safety and enjoyment as their first priority!Lastly, A big thanks to Rahul, Izaan and entire WanderOn team. You guys have a long way to go on the path of success. Cheers and Hope to see you soon again.Kudos ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Samadhan Koli
Title: Winter in Manali is divine
Review: This was my first trip with WanderOn and I am so happy that I did this trip after all!Winter in Manali is divine and WanderOn is perfect to make a plan with. our captains, are a true explorers and gives enough time for you to soak in the experience. They ensures to give a unique experience to everyone in the group. There will never be a dull moment in your trip! The whole team is super supportive and takes your safety and enjoyment as their first priority!Life is too short so just take the first step to book, rest WanderOn will take care;) Make memories and make amazing friendsüëç All the best :)Thanks Rahul and Izaan for a wonderful trip.

Name: Amit K
Title: Amazing Trip
Review: Having mesmerizing view of snowfall became reality few days back. And I am so glad that I finally did with these amazing bunch of people. Manali was truly picture perfect! And it was made a 100 times better with WanderOn group.Izaan (Model Bhaii :P) and Rahul you guys are incredible trip captain. Made all of us feel welcomed and at ease. We instantly felt comfortable with each other. I am truly looking forward to traveling with you again ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Rashmi Priya
Title: Amazing experience
Review: I chose wanderon for my first group trip and I must say it didn't disappoint me at all. It was an awesome experience. The stay they provided was so comfortable and luxurious, the breakfast and dinner options were also too good. Visited Manikaran gurudwara, kasol market, rudranag, solang valley and Manali. Captains Rahul and Izaan were helpful, supportive and cool throughout the trip. It was really a worthwhile experience, I left with such lovely memories of a lifetime. I would highly recommend wanderon for best travelling experience.

Name: ramya
Title: Great Trip
Review: It was my first trip with WanderOn and I was glad to have made this decision. The trip was well planned for the entire duration and we got to experience Kashmir at its best. The group was fun loving and enthusiastic which made the trip even more enjoyable. The captains Shohaib and Maaz ensured our safety and comfort and made sure we did not miss out on any scenic views in spite of the heavy snowfall. Will definitely do more trips with WonderOn again!

Name: Sneh Priya
Title: Amazing trip with Wanderon
Review: My first trip with Wanderon (Kasol-Rudranag-Manali) was a worthwhile experience. Never thought I would spend such amazing moments with strangers who came from different places and left as friends with wonderful lifetime memories. Itinerary was well planned. We visited kasol market, manikaran gurdwara, went for a fun trek to Rudranag and then to Manali. The stay was comfortable and luxurious. Our team captains Rahul Rajput and Izaan Khan were really supportive and cool throughout the journey. I would recommend Wanderon to everyone who is looking for a cool travel community to travel, have fun, make friends and spend the best time of their lives.

Name: Neerav
Title: Life time experience
Review: Amazing captains. One of the best travel communities, would highly recommend. Nice accomodation and very experienced captains.

Name: Abdul Salim Laskar
Title: Best trip ever
Review: We have had an excellent trip to Manali - Solang Valley was our best trip in recent times. This was our first trip with Wonder On. Especially Shresth and Himanshu organised this trip very efficiently.*Shresth Vai and Himanshu Bhaiya is a wonderful person. Their service was more than thousand Stars. That's all we are verry happy and would like to do more trips with Shresth vai and Himanshu Vaiya along with WanderOn Thanks a lot for all your support, Thank you once again‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Ashwini Rao
Title: Wow experience with Wanderon!!
Review: new year bag pack trip: Mcleodganj, Bir, Thirthan. Dec 29th 2022 to Jan 3rd 2023.It was all fun filled, adventurous trip including paragliding, lots of trekking towards waterfalls, river rafting, soul soothing experience of beautiful mountain valleys throught the journey, spectacular view of sunrise n sunset and Beas river.. Pros:¬†‚Ä¢¬†Places where we stayed were scenic, in midst of mountains n near waterbeds. food at resorts was good. luxurious tent stay at Bir was superb. n all places had bonfire to chill at night after the hectic day. I felt that each day was so packed with activities that group rarely had chance to spend good amount of time at bonfire to sit down n relax n have fun conversations. ¬†‚Ä¢¬†paragliding was an amazing experience where as river rafting was more like boating with no much rafts. we could not make to Jalori pass due to heavy snowfall but we were alternatively taken to snow point where group enjoyed playing in snow. exploring chhoei waterfalls in thirthan was a good trekking experience. ¬†‚Ä¢¬†Aditi our team caption is sweet and cool. She was very co-ordinative and effective in managing this diversified group. She was there for each and everyone in the group making sure all are okay and everything is okay, giving the comfort/liniance people expected most of the time. proper instructions were given on each day trekking details, dressing requirements, what to carry etc which was helpful. Cons:¬†‚Ä¢¬†There was kinda no co-ordination between wanderon backend team in providing correct details on trip pick up  and drop off time in Delhi. which lead us to booking flights either very early or too late. after trip we ended up reaching delhi early morning at 4 but our flight was in evening 5.30 which made us search for a stay at last moment and it was not at a good experience to go through since being unfamiliar with Delhi city and we were worried about safety. Hope team takes care of it in future and avoid unpleasant experience of any sort. Conclusion: Wanderon overall is a good travel community, solo trip, group trip whatever it is, we can be rest assured to enjoy every moment of the trip and take good memories back home and make some good connection with people too:)

Name: Cosmicexplorer
Title: Jaunting of Jaisalmer
Review: New year Jaisalmer jaunting was my fourth trip with WanderOn, so it's almost inevitable to understand that I love wandering with them because they have the right set of co-travelers and never fail to curate engaging itineraries. This 3-day fun-filled trip consisted of standout adventures like midnight dune bashing and an adequately arranged welcome to the new year. I had an incredible time and was lucky enough to engross the moments that made me feel infinite.Special shoutout to our skilled team captains, Aditya, Nikita, & Shivanshu, for managing this outrageous group with the utmost entertainment & poise.Kudos to the whole team of WanderOn!

Name: Khushboo Jain
Title: Best trip of 2022 with best travel community!
Review: Kashmir is genuinely a slice of heaven and words will not be able to do justice to the beauty that is Kashmir.I am glad I planned my trip with wanderon and not with any other travel groups because the unprecedented snowfall and hours long road jams needed someone experienced and knowledgeable captains, like Muneeb and Feroz.They both know the place inside out and took smart decisions to wait and halt our entire convoy of travellers to a safe place when we were faced by heavy snowfall and traffic jams in subzero temperatures.They tried tooth and nail to try and book stay for us the entire night, when all of us were sleeping peacefully in Parsa restaurant :)All the stays were very comfortable with one or other sort of heating facilities available in all the hotels.The people were very hospitable throughout, the like minded fellow travellers were like a cherry on the cake and to top it all, the weather was almost always on our sides.Lastly, it gives me immense pleasure to say that I; who generally don‚Äôt like repeating places, can go back again and again to Kashmir, just for the out worldly experience it had to offer.

Name: Pushpa teja
Title: Avarage
Review: Overall trip experience is good.but some places is cancelled.alternately shown other . Need to improve about food there is no proper information weather dinner is included in some resorts are not . Aditi is so nice she is very polite and caring.walk is more it not suitable for families with kids.

Name: Varun
Title: Thank you Team WanderOn
Review: Jus did the Himachal Trip with WanderOn and probably is one of my best decisions of 2022 !! An awesome team of trip leaders who are super chilled out & fun to hang out with. The trip in itself covers the prominent locations of Himachal but can to too tiring for most people since we travel a lot during the 8 days. But all of this was trumped by the chillax team and parties organized by the team. We did have some feedback for the trip leaders at the beginning which was heard and we saw changes in the subsequent days, which was awesome. WanderOn team is open to feedback and did their best to make us comfortable. The stays/ hotels booked were safe, clean and awesome..no complaints there. Overall a fun trip with a fun gang ! Will probably do another one with WanderOn soon. Thanks for the memories WanderOn !!

Name: Preeti
Title: Good Trip
Review: It was my first trip to Bir kasol Rudranag with WanderOn and it was a good experience. The Captains were experienced and had well planned everything in advance. They themselves made sure that we enjoy to the fullest. Accomodation and food was good looking at the trip budget. All the best guys... wishing you all the success.

Name: Yoshitha
Title: Good experience
Review: Great captains, good stays and food :)Amazing group. Super safe.Great for solo or group travel plans. All in all, amazing experience! :D

Name: Madhukar Periwal
Title: New Years in Bir-Kasol-Rudranag
Review: What a trip, what an experience and what an amazing set of strangers. I went to Bir-Kasol-Rudranag with WanderOn, and I'm glad I could be a part of it. The food quality, the hotels that we stayed in, etc cetera was worth every cent. And the cherry on the cake were our trip captains - Prem, Dheeraj and Harshit bhai! They were fun to hang out with, easy to talk to and very focused yet had fun with everyone on the trip. Thank you for giving us a memorable start to 2023! Couldn't ask for a better head start!

Name: Puneet J
Title: WanderOn: Mcleodganj Bir Tirthan trip
Review: Destination - Mcleodganj/Bir/TirthanTeam captain - AditiTldr:Had a amazing trip which included paragliding, rafting, waterfalls, snow, and bonfires. Going to a trip with them again in a few months and 10/10 would recommend Wanderon to friends. Pros-The team captain (Aditi). was really great with ice-breakers, getting the group to gel together with games, etc. You kind of feel like a college group after the first day itself. Team captain was approachable and her food recommendations hit the spot.The stays where all ranging from decent to wonderful (Glamping in tent in Bir being the highlight). There was bonfire on most days. The stay in Bir and Tirthan were quite scenic.Clear agenda for each day given a day earlier with what to wear advice as well. Really good handling of last-minute weather enforced change in itinerary. As an instance, Jalori pass didn't happen for us due to Govt. closing it down, but Aditi planned an alternative day for us. Their commitment to safety gave us the license to chill a bit more.What could be better- We reached back to Delhi a lot earlier than anticipated/communicated, which meant a few of the group had to scramble to arrange night stay. I guess people need to be made more aware of this possibility.

Name: Pranali Chanduka
Title: Great experience
Review: I went on the Bir-Kasol-Rudranag trip with the WanderOn team on New Years 2023 and it was a great experience. Every day was soo much fun and the Captains were experienced and had well planned everything in advance. They themselves made sure that we enjoy to the fullest. I am definitely going on another trip with team WanderOn. All the best guys... wishing you all the success.

Name: Nirupama
Title: MBT group
Review: This was my first trip with Wanderon and had wonderful experience. We have been to Mcleodganj, Bir and Tirthan valley, it's a very beautiful place to visit and had a awesome experience. Had a very cool and experienced team captain Aditi. She is really good in managing people and guided us properly throughout the trip. Thank you so for this wonderful experience üôÇüôÇ

Name: Rothin Shaw
Title: New year in the Hills - WanderOn Rudranaag
Review: Destination: Bir-Kasol-RudranagDates ‚Äì 27th Dec OnwardsCaptains ‚Äì Harshit, Dheeraj, Prem~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Ozzy Ozzy Ozzy... Oye Oye Oye.Chanting like a war cry we got off the bus when we came back to Delhi and left for our mundane lives, carrying only memories of the amazing 5 days spent in the lap of nature.Here is my review of the short group trip I took with 26 other travellers to Bir, Kasol, and Rudranaag.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~2022 had been a long and stressful year for me and I wanted to take some time off for myself. Someone suggested WanderOn's trips and I got in touch with a very helpful sales executive Saniah who cleared all my doubts and helped book the trip etc. Then came the D-Day: December 27th.All bags packed, I meet a few people from the group and Harshit, one of the team captains. We proceed to stow our bags and board the bus. Seat allocation was very smooth and we departed for Bir.During the ride, we were introduced to our other captains, Dheeraj and Prem. We were also explained the itinerary and certain changes which were made to make sure we didn‚Äôt miss out on anything due to weather conditions.Next day, we reached Camp Kasbah, a cosy li‚Äôl place with all the amenities like hot water, heated blankets and spacious beds. The breakfast was good and we headed out for small walk, exploring the monasteries and waiting for our turn to go paragliding.The monasteries are very pretty and calm. We also explored the streets, had some food and went for paragliding, which was an experience in itself. Soaring high with the clouds was unreal. This was the first time I was high in the clouds drifting, seeing the world from a different lens.We were greeted by Dheeraj, our second captain, asking if everything was smooth and if we had a good time. Finally, as evening dawned, we took another hike to a place called the northern cafe, and trust me when I tell you, this was worth every step taken. The sunset that this place has was a view to die for.The night dawned and we went for cafe hopping again to this amazing pace called Viking Caf√©. We vibed and chilled with the locals singing and dancing to tunes and finally went back to our camps where a mighty bonfire was waiting for us, blazing in all its glory.This was just the first day!!!!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Day 2Next day, we had breakfast and left for Kasol in the local transport.We reached Kasol at around 7 PM. The hotel was VERY comfortable and I was not expecting the rooms to be pre-heated before we came. Turns out the captains had already informed the hotel to keep the heaters etc on. (Small things like these go a long way.)Few of us decided to start the cafe hopping in the evening itself. Went out, had cakes, pastries, Maggi, momos, any and everything we wanted (skipped the actual food :P ) and found some good hidden cafe's in Kasol. (One to check out is OFFBEAT Caf√©.)~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Day 38-9-10 That‚Äôs the message our captains gave us for the next day.8:00 Wakeup call9:00 Breakfast10:00 - we leave for ManikaranHike to Manikaran took 1 - 1.5 hours approx. but was breath-taking. The place gave a few really good profile pictures.Manikaran is a beautiful place. The guides told us about its the history, and after exploring it, we went back to kasol for some free time to have lunch etc.Since we had some free time in the evening, the captains carved some time out and added another hike. The Challal Hike was really refreshing; walking next to the river was refreshing and seemed to draw one closer to nature. Again, some really good pictures and videos for the gram!It was a birthday on that day and the captains made sure that they made it special, they arranged for a bonfire on the rooftop with cake and snacks for everyone.All the captains, especially our Kheerganga experts, Dheeraj and Prem, gave a serious gyan to everyone about the dos and the donts for the trek the next day.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~D Day - 31 December 2022We boarded our cabs to go to Barsheni, the starting point of the trek. Here, we met our tour guide and started on the long journey of rocks, mud, snow and ice.The trek started from an iconic bridge just after the road diverts for Tosh.The hike was a lil over 3 - 3.5 Hour long and we could see camps. The trip captains said that we are not going to camps but that we would be visiting a waterfall. This waterfall was Rudranaag.Being one of the first few to arrive, I saw the scenery untouched, unadulterated and undisturbed, my first steps on snow digging deep with every step I took on that white mount.It was MAGNIFICIENT!The temperature was easily 0 - 1 degrees and  tea and maggi were back to the rescue.After spending an hour in the snow-clad mountain clicking hundreds of pictures, we headed back to our camps.KTC or Kheerganga Trekking Camp, as these are called, house 120 individuals and have a HUGE bonfire place and a big common hall, the ONLY two warm places in the whole area.The tea was served in the common area at 5 PM.Dheeraj and Prem played multiple games with us including mafia and bluff, and damn were they good at those games!!!Finally, we had our dinner (a lavish meal considering were were) and waited for 12:00 AM.It was a Happy New Year,  2023.I spent more than an hour in the dark, covered up in blanket, looking at the stars.Finally, the cold night wasn‚Äôt that cold anymore under the blankets.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Next morning.In a place with -10 degrees, in the middle of nowhere one would not expect much for meals.But this place continued to surprise me. It had a good breakfast of poori, sabji, boiled egg and hot tea.We had the tea. Later, thanks to the expert navigation and help from Prem, Dheeraj and Harshit, we were able to climb down in almost an hour.We came back to Kasol in local transport and boarded the bus back to Delhi at night.This is how I spent my new year, making new friends, amazing memories and clicking superb pictures.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~A BIG Shout-out to the trip captains Dheeraj, Prem and Harshit-‚Ä¢	For making the micro- adjustments in the plan to make sure we all had a good time and not miss out on anything.‚Ä¢	For the small history lessons about all the places visited‚Ä¢	For the cakes at the birthdays‚Ä¢	For helping out everyone with anything that they needed, from a band-aid to a bottle of water‚Ä¢	For being amazing at bluff and mafia to make sure that we are engaged, in the cold winter night as we waited for the new year.‚Ä¢	For being a fellow traveler at the end of the day and enjoying the trip as much as we did.Looking forward to traveling with you guys more.Rothin Shaw

Name: Parinaaz
Title: Kashmir 2022
Review: Very well organised and executed trip, with all excursions to food to relaxation. I don‚Äôt like too hectic a schedule and I found the trip just right in terms of activities and variety of activities too! Thank you Shohaib and Maaz for being wonderful trip captains and making this trip a memorable one!

Name: GauravAgarwal
Title: Lets just say, booking my next trip with Wanderon for sure
Review: Took my first Solo trip with Wanderon around New Year, and believe me you, what an experience. My trip consisted of Mclordganj, Bir-Biling and Tirthan. Special Mention to our trip captain Aditi for being such a great manager, taking care of every little things effortlessly. Making sure we have a wonderful time playing games, chilling, bonding and enjoying. For me the best part of the journey was companionship and ease of letting our hearts out.

Name: Amrita Saboo
Title: Life time memorable experience
Review: Before starting the trip had no idea what we would be facing as it was booked by my sister and her husband. But it was a lifetime memorable experience with my gang of 6 with the support of wonderful team of WanderOn..:) Such a lovely bunch of people with whom I celebrated my 40th birthday, Xmas and welcomed the new year 2023. Would love to more trips with WanderOn:)

Name: Deepika meena
Title: 2023 new year celebration in Jaisalmer
Review: Hola Wanderon team So this was my 8th trip with Wanderon, Jaisalmer became more beautiful n exciting with : amazing captains - Nikita, shivaanshu and Aditya you guys make a wonderful team, so hardworking, entertaining and at the same caring n loving, it‚Äôs not easy to handle a group of 52 people but I must say you guys managed everything so perfectly. Nikita - she is love ‚ù§Ô∏è she maintains the professionalism with a good jolly nature, very hardworking üåà Shivanshu- so dedicated towards his work, he‚Äôs an entertainer Aditya- he speaks less but very passionate for his work thanks üòä for showing all the ways ‚Äúyou‚Äôre a ‚Äúchalta-feerta ‚Äú google mapThe memories of new year 2023 celebration will be cherished for lifelong Wanderon rocks üåà

Name: Ankita
Title: Experience sharing
Review: I have recently been on Jaisalmer trip with Wanderon. This was my 5th trip with the team and as always it was awesome. The new year celebration was just as i expected and thanks for giving such a great experience. The best part of wanderon are the team captains.They have always been the cheerful and most engaging one.  For this trip we had Shivanshu and Nikita as the team captains. They both took good care of the team. It was really great travelling with them. I am looking forward to more such wonderful trips with wanderon. Thanks for giving best of experience every time.

Name: Harssh Prabu
Title: A 'Hymn'achal New Year
Review: There are only so many New Years one comes across in his/her life. So you better spend it wisely. And this New Year, I put my my faith in WanderOn. I enrolled for the Kasol, Rudranag, Manali trip.From the time I landed in Delhi, the trip captains (Mirza, Nivedita and Ravi) were readily available and made the convening process simple. Shoutout to captain Nivedita, who helped me feel at home within few minutes with ease. It didn't take long before the 30 odd  trippers (from various parts of India and beyond!) started their journey together with one common goal in mind. On all the following days, I went back to sleep at night with a smile on my face; and that in itself was a quick indicator of how things were going. The properties in Kasol and Manali were excellent. The camp at Rudranag turned out to be one of a kind! How often do you dance beneath snowfall, and around bonfire at the same time, for hours together? At night, the sleep in the tent, after a hard day's trek, surrounded completely by snow, and listening to fresh snow hitting the top of your tent, is like none other. Couple that with a heavy snowfall-filled trek down from Rudranag, and you've got yourself a core memory created. It is a tough job to keep track of, and help, such a large number of people in such difficult terrains, but our captains Nivedita, Mirza, and Ravi did a fabulous job, all the while catering to the incessant photo requests of the excited trippers haha. We celebrated the New Year in Manali. The mood was such that folks from neighbouring hotels started grooving with us from their balconies haha. Everyone wished everyone. There were smiling faces everywhere. The tone was set for 2023.Overall, everyone felt comfortable enough to enjoy their days both as a group as well as an individual. Kudos to the captains for juggling responsibility, entertainment, care, and  empathy, seamlessly. For all travellers out there who want to travel solo but have something stopping you - Begin the travel phase of your lives with WanderOn. And before you know it, there is going to be a memory overflow, both in your cameras, as well as your hearts!

Name: Diksha J
Title: Good
Review: It was my first solo travelling experience, i was a little nervous while booking the ticket but now I truly cherish the beautiful experience WanderOn laid out for me. I along with a group of around 40 travelled to bir-billing, tirthan McLeod Ganj during NY. The hotels were very good, especially the camp. Our trip captains Rahul, Sana and Prashant were so professional in their planning and management. Kudos to them for making it so special for everyone! Just faced one problem on the last day as we were dropped too early before the reaching time in Delhi and we had to look for accommodation at 5am in the morning. Other than this it was an amazing experience. I definitely recommend WanderOn for all the travel gigs out there, especially for solo ones, just go for it, you will not regret it!!

Name: Neha J
Title: Overall good experience
Review: I had a good experience with the trip captains - Shohaib & Maaz, they were very helpful and made sure we had a good trip.

Name: Rishabh Gautam
Title: Amazing!!!
Review: Couple of points to summarise my first solo trip with WanderOn.- Itinerary was very well planned and executed.- Captains make sure everyone is safe and having fun.- Co-travellers were young & friendly.

Name: Ratna
Title: McBirThan trip experience
Review: Recently I have done a trip with wanderon to McLeodganj, Bir billing &Tirthan and the vacation was hassle free and fabulous. The accommodation, locations and experiences were extremely varied and always fascinating. All the captains including Prashant, Sana and Rahul were very efficient and made sure this trip to be filled with fun and adventure for each one of us. Thanks to wanderon for this trip which provided me with memories which will last lifetime.

Name: Lokesh
Title: Delightful
Review: I travelled to Kashmir on a new year's trip with WanderOn after an amazing experience in Ladakh in May, 22. WanderOn again gave me a phenomenal experience. Starting from the arrangements, to their plans to ensure safe and best experiences for the travellers, everything is managed flawlessly here. The co-traveller group is amazing. Even a solo traveller is made to feel inclusive and welcomed with such an ease. This trip was one of the most memorable one for me. Simply because of the harsh weather conditions and our captains quick plan of actions to continue to keep us safe and engaged. The continuing heads about the right places to buy souvenirs and dos and don'ts saved us a lot of effort and money. I cherish my friendships, the captains dedication, WanderOn's conviction to privide the best experience to its travelers. I will not think twice before booking my next travel Thank you much Team for everything üòÉüòÅü´†üòäüòáü•∞‚ùÑÔ∏è

Name: Steffie Chettiar
Title: The Best Winter Trip to Kashmir and again an Amazing one!!!!
Review: This was my 3rd trip with Wanderon in the last 1 year - I see a lot of people often travel with different travel companies - But the trust which I have in Wanderon as a travel company speaks for itself. They really care for the people who travel with them and make sure they enjoy the trip and its worth every minute!!!The 7 days trip to Kashmir was the best - well organised, amazing stays and the Best captains. A lot of gratitude and thank you to the team - keep organising such amazing trips! Subeh and Maaz - I guess thank you is not enough - this trip wouldn‚Äôt have been awesome without you guysüòÅ I look forward to travelling with Wanderon again!!!!

Name: Swati
Title: Kashmir trip with magical experience
Review: I had Kashmir trip with WanderOn and it was beyond my imagination. Our trip Captains Muneeb and Feroz was so friendly and helpful, they took utmost care of our group and provided best experience. The stay at each place was so comfortable and cozy which made every single person in the group happy.I would recommend Wanderon to everyone. Wanderon helps us reach so many good people from their trips and gives us lifetime of friendship and good memories.

Name: Aruna S
Title: Safe and fun filled trip
Review: Felt extremely safe and had great fun with the team. Arrangements were decent and met expectations. Paragliding from 8k ft and experiencing negative temperatures were made easy by the team.

Name: Radhika Shah
Title: Beautiful & Absolute fun
Review: This was my First time with WanderOnWent for Kashmir Backpacking trip.It was Super amazing & very well organized.Our Trip Captains took great care of us,Opium & Maaz - Kudosüëèüèº to them.They helped us out in every way, had backup places ready on their lists the moment we got stuck in Snow & had their way with the locals.It was quite an adventure & absolutely breathtaking Thankyouu for the amazing experience. Waiting for More trips with the team WanderOn
